nodes.text: The Holgorian IM-220 was a droid model that was produced by the Je'daii Order during the Pre-Republic era.

The Holgorian IM-220 was a small droid which used padded metal feet to move around. It was capable of limited communication with a Human master and other duties not necessarily exclusive to ship maintenance.

One notable example of this model was the personal droid of Je'daii Ranger Lanoree Brock, a Human female of the Je'daii Order. She had customized the droid with heavy armor, doubling its weight but also making it helpful in risky situations.
